thread.title: Bodegas boycott: Yemeni-owned NYC corner stores protest Trump’s Muslim ban

author: admin
title: Bodegas boycott: Yemeni-owned NYC corner stores protest Trump’s Muslim ban
text:
Bodegas boycott: Yemeni-owned NYC corner stores protest Trump’s Muslim ban Bodegas boycott: Yemeni-owned NYC corner stores protest Trump’s Muslim ban By 0 28 
New York City is facing an economic nightmare the size of the Stay Puft Marshmallow Man: Many of the city’s ubiquitous corner stores, called bodegas, have shuttered in protest of President Donald Trump’s executive order against some Muslim immigrants. 
Via RT . This piece was reprinted by RINF Alternative News with permission or license.
